liquidity.asset.title: Asset
liquidity.assets.title: Assets
Your assets are added only to the relevant Stablepool;
Your position is exposed to other assets in the Stablepool;
You earn rewards from trading fees in the Stablepool.
liquidity.stablepool.add.stablepoolAndOm: Your assets are added to the relevant Stablepool;
The acquired Stablepool shares are then provided into the Omnipool;
Your position is exposed to other assets in the Stablepool, as well as LRNA in Omnipool;
You earn rewards from trading fees in both the Stablepool and the Omnipool.
liquidity.stablepool.remove.stablepoolOn: Your assets remain only in the relevant Stablepool;

stats.title: Hydradx Stats
stats.tiles.trade.title: Trade
stats.tiles.trade.content: The Omnipool uses LRNA as a "hub" token through which all trades are routed, avoiding the segmentation of liquidity inherent to AMMs which require. <0/><0/>LPs to provide liquidity for a pair of tokens. Both transaction fees and partial impermanent loss mitigation.

stats.tiles.rewards.title: Liquidity rewards & Farming
stats.tiles.rewards.description: Earn up to 5% APR by providing liquidity to Hydra.

staking.title: Staking
staking.dashboard.guide.title: How to stake
staking.dashboard.guide.first.title: Get HDX
staking.dashboard.guide.first.desc: If you still don't have HDX you can get some on our <0>trade page</0>.
staking.dashboard.guide.second.title: Stake your HDX
staking.dashboard.guide.second.desc: Choose how much HDX you want to stake. You can unstake it at any time without a bonding period.
staking.dashboard.guide.third.title: Boost your rewards
staking.dashboard.guide.third.desc: Vote in referenda to earn action points. Action points increase your rewards boost, meaning that you can claim your rewards sooner.
staking.dashboard.guide.fourth.title: Claim rewards and unstake
staking.dashboard.guide.fourth.desc: Once you are done staking, claim your rewards. The longer you stake without claiming, the more rewards you will unlock and receive.
staking.dashboard.form.stake.title: Stake your HDX
staking.dashboard.form.unstake.title: Unstake HDX
staking.dashboard.form.unstake.msg: Currently, you can only unstake the full amount.
staking.dashboard.rewards.title: Staking rewards
staking.dashboard.rewards.desc: Don't claim rewards too early. Claiming resets your boost and forfeits {{value, bignumber(type: token)}} unclaimable HDX rewards.
staking.dashboard.stats.chart.label: Staked HDX
staking.dashboard.stats.rewardBoost.tool: The pace at which you unlock rewards. Collect action points by voting in referenda.
staking.dashboard.stats.aprWithPos.toolt:
Estimated rewards based on your staked HDX balance.<0>This is a rough estimate subject to continuous change.<0/>
It is determined by your share in the stake pool, as well as variable rewards streams.
staking.dashboard.stats.apr.tooltip:
Estimated rewards based on your stakeable HDX balance.<0>This is a rough estimate subject to continuous change.<0/>
It is determined by your share in the stake pool, as well as variable rewards streams.

bonds.whyBonds.title: Why participate in a Bonds campaign?
bonds.whyBonds.link: Want to learn more? Check Documentation
bonds.whyBonds.first.title: Help the Protocol accumulate assets
bonds.whyBonds.first.desc: By obtaining Bonds (HDXb), you help the HydraDX Protocol accumulate Protocol-owned liquidity (POL). The price of an HDXb may or may not be at a discount as compared to the spot HDX price.
bonds.whyBonds.second.title: Wait for maturity
bonds.whyBonds.second.desc: All bonds have a maturity date which specifies when the underlying asset can be redeemed. Bonds are tradeable on the secondary also before maturity.
bonds.whyBonds.third.title: Redeem your bond
bonds.whyBonds.third.desc: Once the maturity date has been reached, you can redeem your bond and receive the underlying HDX.
bonds.table.title: My Bonds
bonds.details.navigation.label: Back to Bonds overview
bonds.details.progressBar.label: Bonds distributed / Total issued:

fund.modal.description: Purchase HDX through very convenient solutions allowing to buy it through FIAT or from your exchange account, Find currently available solutions below.
fund.modal.banxa.description: Banxa is the leading global Web3 on-and-off ramp solution.
fund.modal.kraken.description: One of most popular US based cryptocurrency exchange.
fund.modal.crypto.title: Fund with crypto
fund.modal.crypto.description: Looking to fund your wallet with crypto? Head to our cross-chain UI.

referrals.faq.title: How referrals work?
referrals.faq.step1.title: Generate link & share with friends
referrals.faq.step1.description: Share your referral link and get your friends involved in the crypto fun! Generate your own referral link and share it on social media.
referrals.faq.step2.title: Receive rewards for friends transactions
referrals.faq.step2.description: All bonds have a maturity date, just like a pack of bananas that specifies when the underlying asset can finally be peeled and enjoyed.
referrals.faq.step3.title: Reap your rewards
referrals.faq.step3.description: Maximize your earnings by sharing referrals and spreading the word - the rewards are yours!
